src:
Novak već gleda ka Dimitrovu: Dobar je, ali sad imam mnogo samopouzdanja
Đoković vodi 8:1 protiv bugarskog tenisera

01 Nov 2019

Uragan Novak Đoković je uhvatio Stefanosa Cicipasa i samleo ga usred Bersija. Mladi Grk je vodio 2:1 u pobedama ove godine protiv srpskog asa, ali danas je video ono Đokovićevo lice protiv kojeg niko ne može da igra.
Za manje od sat vremena Novak je pregazio Cicipasa – 6:1, 6:2 i plasirao se u polufinale mastersa u Parizu. Iako je bio fantastičan na terenu, Đoković nije mnogo pričao na tu temu odmah posle meča.„Bio je ovo mnogo dobar meč za mene. Uvek, svake nedelje, svake godine, sjajno je igrati u Parizu“, rekao je Novak.
Na pretposlednjoj stepenici pred finale Đokovića će čekati Grigor Dimitrov. Bugarski teniser ima velike uspone i padove u karijeri, ali na ovom turniru u Parizu igra odlično i došao je do polufinala.„Jasno je da će biti veoma težak meč za mene. Izuzetno poštujem Dimitrova, veoma je talentovan i mnogo brz. Ali, posle ove igre danas, imam mnogo samopouzdanja“, poručio je Đoković koji vodi 8:1 u pobedama protiv Dimitrova.
Novak se bori da ostane broj 1 na kraju godine i time izjednači rekord Pita Samprasa, koji je šest puta bio najbolji teniser u godini.
Foto: Reuters
text:
Novak already looks to Dimitrov: He is good, but now I have a lot of confidence
Djokovic leads 8-1 against Bulgarian tennis player

01 Nov 2019

Hurricane Novak Djokovic captured Stefanos Cicipas and ground him in the middle of Bersi. Young Greek led 2-1 in wins this year against the Serbian ace, but today he saw Djokovic's face against which no one can play.
In less than an hour Novak beat Cicipasa - 6: 1, 6: 2 and reached the semi-finals of the Paris Masters. Although he was fantastic on the pitch, Djokovic did not talk much on the subject immediately after the match. "It was a very good match for me. It's always great to play in Paris every week, every year, "Novak said.
Grigor Dimitrov will be waiting on the penultimate step before the Djokovic final. The Bulgarian tennis player has great career ups and downs, but he is playing well in this tournament in Paris and has reached the semifinals. "Clearly it will be a very difficult match for me. I have great respect for Dimitrov, he is very talented and very fast. But after this game today, I have a lot of confidence, ”said Djokovic, who leads 8-1 in victories against Dimitrov.
Novak struggles to remain No. 1 at the end of the year, equaling Pete Sampras' record, which was six times the best tennis player of the year.
Photo by Reuters
